verses.verse: The Lord <WH3068> reigns <WH4427>; let the people <WH5971> tremble <WH7264>: he sits <WH3427> between the cherubims <WH3742>; let the earth <WH776> be moved <WH5120>.
The Lord <WH3068> is great <WH1419> in Zion <WH6726>; and he is high <WH7311> above all the people <WH5971>.
Let them praise <WH3034> your great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> name <WH8034>; for it is holy <WH6918>.

The king <WH4428>'s strength <WH5797> also loves <WH157> judgment <WH4941>; you do establish <WH3559> equity <WH4339>, you execute <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in Jacob <WH3290>.
Exalt <WH7311> you the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> at his footstool <WH7272>; for he is holy <WH6918>.

Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> among his priests <WH3548>, and Samuel <WH8050> among them that call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>; they called <WH7121> upon the Lord <WH3068>, and he answered them <WH6030>.
He spoke <WH1696> unto them in the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982>: they kept <WH8104> his testimonies <WH5713>, and the ordinance <WH2706> that he gave them <WH5414>.
You answered <WH6030> them <WH3068>, O Lord our God <WH430>: you were a God <WH410> that forgave <WH5375> them <WH5358>, though you took vengeance of their inventions <WH5949>.
Exalt <WH7311> the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> at his holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>; for the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430> is holy <WH6918>.
